Articles.Content:
hi all,

I'm currently working on version 0.33 of RemoteTech and among some tweaks, fixes and cleanup, I'd like to add a config file for the plugin itself in order to re-add the ability to set your own speed of light.

For now, I can't get my head around how to make a config file for something that is not an extension of the Part class.

Now I am very inexperienced in coding, so it's entirely possible that I'm overlooking something obvious, since so many of you have working config files for your plugins that I have no idea how work .

In short, I'm putting this question out to the community:

How exactly do I add a config file to a non-Part class?

Cheers

-JDP
